paper.title: Pricing European Options with Deep Learning Models
paper.abstract: Applications of artificial neural networks for valuing financial options have a long history in academic research. When appropriately trained, these artificial neural networks have proved to obtain better results than traditional parametric models like Black-Scholes. This short paper intends to review the input variables and specific architecture of a multi-layer perceptron, long-short term memory and a convolutional neural network model for the purpose of pricing options. Additionally, it describes the data gathering process for the dataset that will be used to train these models.

domain_result.justification: 该论文明确讨论了使用深度学习模型（如多层感知机、长短期记忆网络和卷积神经网络）来定价欧式期权，这直接属于衍生品定价的研究领域。论文还提到了与传统模型（如Black-Scholes模型）的比较，进一步确认了其应用领域。
